h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses
h2_title: How to Find Yellow Loong - Chapter 4 Secret Boss
content: After this fight, the hand will become a bridge that you can use to get down to the lower levels. Go across the hand and the insect body attached to it, then drop down from the wooden path.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Loong_Dragon_Bosses.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Yellow Loong - Chapter 4 Secret Boss'.
The content is as follows:
After this fight, the hand will become a bridge that you can use to get down to the lower levels. Go across the hand and the insect body attached to it, then drop down from the wooden path.
